title: At the java.net community event
body:
One of the great things that's happening at this JavaOne is the
launching of java.net and all of the stuff around it. They're doing
a lot to build even more of a sense of community in the java world.
I just got back from a community event that covered a lot of
important topics: like what all the pieces are and how community
governance works. Of course, I was just there for the beer and a
photo-op with Duke.
